item.title: 澳洲联储缓和鹰派观点后，美元稳定，澳元走软
item.description:
The dollar was steady on Tuesday as traders took a breather from a risk rally, while the Aussie slid after the Reserve Bank of Australia raised rates, but left the door open on whether further hikes would be needed.翻译:周二，交易员从风险反弹中稍作喘息，美元保持稳定，而澳元在澳大利亚储备银行加息后下跌，但对于是否需要进一步加息仍持开放态度。

The RBA raised interest rates by 25 basis points on Tuesday, ending four months of steady policy, but a tweak in language regarding the outlook stoked expectations that the central bank was done with its rate hikes.翻译:澳洲联储周二加息 25 个基点，结束了四个月的稳定政策，但有关前景的语言调整引发了人们对央行结束加息的预期。

The Australian dollar fell 0.52% to $0.6474 after the decision and was last at $0.6460, but the currency remained close to the three-month peak of $0.6523 touched on Monday.翻译:决定公布后，澳元兑美元下跌0.52%至0.6474美元，最新报0.6460美元，但仍接近周一触及的三个月高点0.6523美元。

Commonwealth Bank of Australia's currency strategist Carol Kong said the forward guidance was slightly watered down, which was perceived as dovish, resulting in the Aussie quickly giving back its gains after an initial knee-jerk rally.翻译:澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师Carol Kong表示，前瞻性指引略有淡化，这被认为是鸽派的，导致澳元在最初的本能反弹后迅速回吐涨幅。

The Aussie and the New Zealand dollar have rallied over the past few days after a benign U.S. jobs report led markets to price in rate cuts by the middle of next year, lifting risk appetite. The kiwi was off 0.15% at $0.59545.翻译:在美国良好的就业报告导致市场消化明年年中降息的预期后，澳元和新西兰元在过去几天上涨，从而提振了风险偏好。新西兰元下跌 0.15%，至 0.59545 美元。

"With the RBA out of the way, the major determinants of AUD/USD will shift back to global. Expect focus to move back to Fed rhetoric and the resultant impacts on US Treasuries," Kong said.翻译:“随着澳洲联储的退出，澳元/美元的主要决定因素将重新转向全球。预计焦点将重新回到美联储的言论及其对美国国债的影响上，”孔说。

The rally in bonds and equities last week looks to be fading, with yields higher at the start of the week and the market focus switching to a flurry of U.S. Fed officials due to speak this week.翻译:上周债券和股票的涨势似乎正在消退，本周初收益率走高，市场焦点转向本周将发表讲话的一系列美联储官员。

Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said on Monday the U.S. central bank likely has more work ahead of it to control inflation.翻译:明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔·卡什卡利周一表示，美联储可能还有更多工作来控制通胀。

Fed Chairman Jerome Powell is due to speak on Wednesday and Thursday, where the focal point will be on whether he maintains the more dovish tone struck after the Fed’s policy meeting last week.翻译:美联储主席鲍威尔将于周三和周四发表讲话，焦点将是他是否维持上周美联储政策会议后的温和基调。

"If Powell sounds a bit more hawkish to push back against the easing of financial conditions later this week ... I think the dollar can rebound," said CBA's Kong.翻译:CBA 的 Kong 表示：“如果鲍威尔在本周晚些时候采取更加强硬的态度来抵制金融状况的放松……我认为美元可能会反弹。”

"But I think it's still too early to say the latest easing in the dollar will be sustained. Just given that the FOMC is still unclear whether or not they wanted to hike rates further."翻译:“但我认为现在说美元的最新宽松政策将持续还为时过早。鉴于联邦公开市场委员会仍不清楚他们是否希望进一步加息。”

Against a basket of currencies, the dollar index rose 0.085% to 105.36, having climbed 0.2% on Monday, but remained not far off a nearly two-month low of 104.84 touched on Monday.翻译:美元指数兑一篮子货币上涨0.085%至105.36，周一上涨0.2%，但距离周一触及的近两个月低点104.84不远。

The euro was down 0.07% to $1.0707, easing away from the eight-week peak of $1.0756 hit on Monday. Sterling was last at $1.2335, down 0.05% on the day, just shy of the seven-week high of $1.2428 it hit on Monday.翻译:欧元兑美元下跌0.07%至1.0707美元，较周一触及的八周高点1.0756美元有所回落。英镑最新报1.2335美元，当日下跌0.05%，略低于周一触及的七周高点1.2428美元。

The Japanese yen was at 150.23 per dollar back above the 150-level that has kept traders on edge in recent weeks as they look for signs of intervention from Tokyo.翻译:日元兑美元汇率为 150.23 美元，重回 150 水平上方，近几周来，交易员在寻找东京干预迹象时感到紧张。

The yen hit 151.74 per dollar last week, edging closer to October 2022 lows that spurred several rounds of dollar-selling intervention.翻译:日元兑美元上周触及 151.74，逼近 2022 年 10 月低点，引发多轮美元抛售干预。

Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Monday the country was making progress towards achieving the bank's 2% target but not enough to end ultra-loose policy, warning of uncertainty over whether companies will keep rising wages next year.翻译:日本央行行长上田一夫周一表示，日本在实现央行 2% 的目标方面正在取得进展，但还不足以结束超宽松政策，并警告称，企业明年是否会继续上涨工资存在不确定性。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore. Editing by Sam Holmes and Miral Fahmy翻译:安库尔·班纳吉 (Ankur Banerjee) 驻新加坡报道。山姆·霍姆斯和米拉尔·法赫米编辑

item.title: 亚洲股市连涨，澳元下跌
item.description:
Asian stocks snapped a three-day winning streak on Tuesday, falling with mixed Chinese trade data and wavering enthusiasm about a peak in global interest rates - though a hike in Australia was taken as likely to be the last in its cycle.翻译:亚洲股市周二结束了连续三天的上涨势头，因中国贸易数据好坏参半以及人们对全球利率见顶的热情动摇而下跌，尽管澳大利亚的加息被认为可能是其周期中的最后一次加息。

Stubbornly high inflation last quarter had markets expecting the 25 basis point hike from the Reserve Bank of Australia, but a softening of language about the outlook rallied bonds and dragged on the Aussie dollar on bets hikes were now finished.翻译:上季度通胀居高不下，市场预期澳大利亚储备银行将加息 25 个基点，但有关前景的软化言论提振了债券，并拖累了澳元，因加息押注现已结束。

The Aussie was last 0.5% softer at $0.6460.翻译:澳元兑美元最后下跌 0.5%，至 0.6460 美元。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) fell 1.2% following a three-day rally that lifted the benchmark by nearly 6%.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)在连续三天上涨近 6% 后下跌 1.2%。

South Korean shares (.KS11) fell 3% as traders unwound some of Monday's surge on the reimposition of a short-selling ban. Japan's Nikkei (.N225) fell 1.1%.翻译:韩国股市(.KS11)下跌 3%，交易商因重新实施卖空禁令而平仓了周一的部分上涨。日本日经指数(.N225)下跌 1.1%。

China's imports unexpectedly grew in October, while exports contracted at a quicker pace, in a mixed set of indicators that showed the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven. The Shanghai Composite (.SSEC) fell 0.4%.翻译:中国10月份进口意外增长，而出口则以更快的速度收缩，一系列复杂的指标表明世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然不平衡。上证综指(.SSEC)下跌 0.4%。

Treasuries were broadly steady in Asia, having unwound a little of last week's rally on Monday. Ten-year yields hovered at 4.92% - about 10 basis points above where they closed on Friday, but below where they were a week earlier.翻译:亚洲国债总体稳定，周一部分回吐了上周的涨幅。十年期国债收益率徘徊在 4.92%，较上周五收盘价高出约 10 个基点，但低于一周前的收盘价。

Overnight the Nasdaq (.IXIC) logged a seventh straight session of gains - its longest streak since January - though its gain was a slender 0.3% as the rally loses some steam. S&P 500 futures and European futures each fell 0.2%.翻译:隔夜纳斯达克指数(.IXIC)连续第七个交易日上涨，这是自 1 月份以来最长的连续上涨势头，尽管由于涨势失去了一些动力，其涨幅仅为 0.3%。标准普尔 500 指数期货和欧洲期货均下跌 0.2%。

"It continues to be a tug-of-war between markets and the Fed, as the latter has suggested that higher long-end yields would ... do the job of policy tightening for them," said Nicholas Chia, macro strategist at Standard Chartered.翻译:标准银行宏观策略师尼古拉斯·谢(Nicholas Chia)表示，“市场和美联储之间仍然是一场拉锯战，因为后者表示，长期收益率上升将......为他们起到收紧政策的作用。”特许。

"Markets probably fret that lower yields would force the Fed to re-think about an extended pause."

SLOW DOWN

In foreign exchange markets the Aussie dollar was the biggest mover in the Asian timezone and Australian government bonds also rallied at the short-end as traders took the RBA's language as a signal rate hikes were likely finished.翻译:在外汇市场上，澳元是亚洲时区涨幅最大的货币，澳大利亚政府债券也在短期内上涨，因为交易员将澳大利亚央行的措辞视为加息可能结束的信号。

"It was a dovish hike...it's not pointing to any immediate need for a follow-up," said RBC Capital Markets rates strategist Rob Thompson on the phone from Sydney.翻译:加拿大皇家银行资本市场利率策略师罗布·汤普森(Rob Thompson)在悉尼的电话中表示，“这是一次温和的加息……并不意味着立即需要采取后续行动。”

Elsewhere a slightly stronger dollar has pushed the Japanese yen back to the weak side of 150 to the dollar, and it hovered at 150.2 in the Asia session.翻译:其他方面，美元小幅走强已将日元推回到150兑美元的弱势区间，并在亚洲时段徘徊在150.2。

The euro took a breather at $1.0710 and analysts expect any prospective decline in the greenback to be bumpy and modest, even if the Fed starts cutting rates next year.翻译:欧元在1.0710美元稍作喘息，分析师预计，即使美联储明年开始降息，美元的任何预期下跌都将是坎坷且温和的。

The U.S. dollar index was steady at 105.36.翻译:美元指数持稳于105.36。

"Outside of monetary policy, it is weak global growth and abundant geopolitical risks ranging from Taiwan to the Middle East and Russia that we see as providing continued safe-haven support to the dollar, slowing a dollar down cycle," said Deutsche Bank strategists Alan Ruskin and George Saravelos.翻译:德意志银行策略师艾伦表示，“除了货币政策之外，全球经济增长疲软，以及从台湾到中东和俄罗斯等地缘政治风险，为美元提供了持续的避险支撑，减缓了美元下行周期。”拉斯金和乔治·萨拉维洛斯。

In commodity markets oil steadied with Brent crude futures at $84.75 a barrel, supported by nerves that conflict in the Middle East could expand and threaten supply and as Russia and Saudi Arabia reaffirmed production cuts.翻译:在大宗商品市场，由于中东冲突可能扩大并威胁供应以及俄罗斯和沙特阿拉伯重申减产，油价与布伦特原油期货稳定在每桶 84.75 美元。

Gold nursed modest losses at $1,972, while bitcoin hovered just shy of $35,000.翻译:黄金小幅下跌至 1,972 美元，而比特币则徘徊在 35,000 美元附近。

Additional reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore. Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡的补充报道。林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: “中国计划”媒体公司因资金问题关闭
item.description:
One of the few independently funded English-language publications to cover China in depth for Western audiences, "The China Project", is to close because of a lack of funding, its editor-in-chief, Jeremy Goldkorn, wrote in a post.翻译:《中国计划》是为数不多的为西方读者深入报道中国的独立资助英文出版物之一，其主编杰里米·戈德科恩(Jeremy Goldkorn)在一篇文章中写道，由于缺乏资金，该出版物即将关闭。

The China Project, which began as a newsletter in 2016 and was formerly known as SupChina, expanded to become a "news and business intelligence company focused on helping a global audience understand China", it says on its website.翻译:中国项目在其网站上表示，该项目始于 2016 年，最初是一份时事通讯，前身为 SupChina，现已扩展成为一家“专注于帮助全球受众了解中国的新闻和商业情报公司”。

Its products included the popular China news and society-themed Sinica podcast, articles on a wide range of China-themed topics on its website, a business intelligence data product "ChinaEDGE" and organising conferences.翻译:其产品包括热门的中国新闻和社会主题的《Sinica》播客、网站上有关各种中国主题的文章、商业智能数据产品“ChinaEDGE”以及组织会议。

Staff numbers increased too. But as with a number of online-based media companies in recent years, such as Buzzfeed News, financing became a problem.翻译:员工人数也增加了。但与近年来许多网络媒体公司（例如 Buzzfeed News）一样，融资成为了一个问题。

"The media business is precarious," Goldkorn wrote in a statement on the website.翻译:“媒体业务岌岌可危，”金科恩在网站上的一份声明中写道。

"This week, we learned that a source of funding that we had been counting on was no longer going to come through, and we have had to make the difficult decision to close down."翻译:“本周，我们得知我们一直指望的资金来源不再可用，我们不得不做出关闭的艰难决定。”

The company sought to produce "balanced" reporting on China and U.S.-China-themed topics. But this attracted criticism as relations between the two powers sank to new depths.翻译:该公司力求就中国和中美主题话题进行“平衡”的报道。但随着两国关系跌入新的深度，此举招致批评。

"We have been accused many times in both countries of working for nefarious purposes for the government of the other," Goldkorn said.翻译:戈德科恩说：“我们在两国都多次被指控为对方政府从事邪恶目的。”

"Defending ourselves has incurred enormous legal costs, and, far worse, made it increasingly difficult for us to attract investors, advertisers, and sponsors. While our subscription offerings have been growing strongly and steadily, we are not yet in a position to rely on these revenues to sustain our operations."翻译:“为自己辩护带来了巨大的法律成本，更糟糕的是，使我们越来越难以吸引投资者、广告商和赞助商。虽然我们的订阅服务一直强劲而稳定地增长，但我们还无法依赖这些收入可以维持我们的运营。”

Media companies globally have had mixed success with subscription models.翻译:全球媒体公司在订阅模式方面取得了不同程度的成功。

The China Project's subscription package offered "the internet's best birds-eye view of China" for $120 a year, which was still on offer to site visitors on Tuesday, according to a Reuters check.翻译:据路透社报道，中国项目的订阅套餐以每年 120 美元的价格提供“互联网上最好的中国鸟瞰图”，该套餐周二仍在向网站访问者提供。

"We do not have a business model problem," company CEO Bob Guterma told Reuters via email.翻译:“我们不存在商业模式问题，”公司首席执行官鲍勃·古特玛通过电子邮件告诉路透社。

"We made big plans and pursued them boldly with the full backing of our investors. But in the past six months, investor interest has dropped off precipitously due to economic and geopolitical headwinds. We became unable to sustain what we had grown into."翻译:“我们制定了宏伟的计划，并在投资者的全力支持下大胆地实现它们。但在过去的六个月里，由于经济和地缘政治的逆风，投资者的兴趣急剧下降。我们变得无法维持我们的发展。”

Reporting by Martin Quin Pollard, additional reporting by Laurie Chen, Casey Hall, Brenda Goh ; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Martin Quin Pollard 报道，Laurie Chen、Casey Hall、Brenda Goh 补充报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 10月中国进口意外增长出口延续跌势
item.description:
China's imports unexpectedly grew in October while exports contracted at a quicker pace, in a mixed set of indicators that showed the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven amid multiple challenges at home and abroad.翻译:10月份中国进口意外增长，而出口则加速收缩，一系列指标显示，在国内外多重挑战的背景下，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍不平衡。

Recent indicators suggest Beijing's support measures since June are helping bolster a tentative recovery, although a protracted property crisis and soft global demand continue to dog policymakers heading into 2024.翻译:近期指标显示，北京自 6 月以来的支持措施正在帮助推动初步复苏，尽管旷日持久的房地产危机和全球需求疲软将继续困扰决策者进入 2024 年。

Exports shrank 6.4% from a year earlier in October, customs data showed on Tuesday, faster than a 6.2% decline in September and worse than a 3.3% fall expected in a Reuters poll. Imports rose 3.0%, dashing forecasts for a 4.8% contraction and swinging from a 6.2% fall in September. Imports snapped 11 straight months of decline.翻译:周二海关数据显示，10 月份出口同比萎缩 6.4%，高于 9 月份 6.2% 的降幅，也低于路透调查预期的 3.3% 降幅。进口增长 3.0%，远超预期的收缩 4.8%，且与 9 月份的下降 6.2% 持平。进口结束了连续 11 个月的下降。

"The figures are in contrast to market expectations. The bad exports data may hit market confidence as we had expected the supply chain of exports to recover," said Zhou Hao, economist at Guotai Junan International.翻译:国泰君安国际经济学家周浩表示：“这些数据与市场预期相反。糟糕的出口数据可能会打击市场信心，因为我们原本预计出口供应链将恢复。”

"The significant improvement in imports may come from rising domestic demand, in particular a demand to replenish stocks."翻译:“进口的显着改善可能来自国内需求的增长，特别是补充库存的需求。”

The Baltic Dry Index, a bellwether gauge of global trade, hit its lowest since December 2020 in October, due to congestion in North American and European ports.翻译:由于北美和欧洲港口拥堵，衡量全球贸易的风向标波罗的海干散货指数在 10 月份触及 2020 年 12 月以来的最低水平。

However, in a sign trade is finding some footing, South Korean exports to China fell at their slowest pace in 13 months in October.翻译:然而，10 月份韩国对中国的出口降幅为 13 个月来的最低水平，这表明贸易已站稳脚跟。

China posted a trade surplus of $56.53 billion in October, compared with a $82.00 billion surplus expected in the poll and $77.71 billion in September.翻译:中国10月份贸易顺差为565.3亿美元，而民意调查预期顺差为820亿美元，9月份为777.1亿美元。

Analysts say it is too early to tell whether recent policy support will be enough to shore up domestic demand, with property, unemployment and weak household and business confidence threatening a sustainable rebound.翻译:分析师表示，现在判断近期的政策支持是否足以提振内需还为时过早，房地产、失业以及疲弱的家庭和企业信心威胁着经济的可持续反弹。

China's manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted in October, data showed last week, complicating policymakers' efforts to revive growth.翻译:上周数据显示，中国十月份制造业活动意外收缩，使政策制定者恢复增长的努力变得更加复杂。

Reporting by Joe Cash and Ellen Zhang. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:乔·卡什和艾伦·张报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: WeWork中国不会参与WeWork战略重组
item.description:
WeWork China will not participate in the strategic reorganisation of WeWork (WE.N) in the United States and Canada, it said on Tuesday.翻译:周二，WeWork 中国表示，不会参与 WeWork （WE.N）在美国和加拿大的战略重组。

WeWork China is not a branch or unit of WeWork (WE.N), it said in a statement on WeChat, adding the company has independent operations and management capabilities.翻译:该公司在微信上发表声明称，WeWork中国并非WeWork （WE.N）的分支机构或单位，并补充说公司具有独立的运营和管理能力。

WeWork, the SoftBank Group (9984.T)-backed startup, sought U.S. bankruptcy protection on Monday, after its bets on companies using more of its office-sharing space soured.翻译:软银集团(9984.T)支持的初创公司 WeWork 在押注更多使用其办公共享空间的公司失败后，于周一寻求美国破产保护。

"Any operating conditions of WeWork in other regions around the world will not have any impact on WeWork China," it added.翻译:“WeWork在全球其他地区的任何运营情况不会对WeWork中国产生任何影响，”它补充道。

Reporting by Ella Cao, Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:Ella Cao、Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 独家：中国罕见的货币市场困境背后的优先事项相互冲突
item.description:
China's attempts to keep the yuan from falling contributed to last week's chaos in money markets, sources involved say, pointing to the pressure behind the scenes as Beijing tries to guide its economy and markets through a major slowdown.翻译:相关消息人士称，中国试图阻止人民币贬值，导致了上周货币市场的混乱，并指出了北京试图引导经济和市场度过大幅放缓之际的幕后压力。

Routine month-end demand for cash in China's banking system snowballed into a scramble on Oct. 31 that pushed short-term funding rates as high as 50% in some cases, an incident that authorities are now investigating.翻译:10月31日，中国银行系统月末例行的现金需求如滚雪球般加剧，导致短期融资利率在某些情况下高达50%，当局目前正在调查这一事件。

Six participants in the market say a confluence of factors drove fear and confusion across trading rooms in Shanghai and Beijing by late afternoon on that day.翻译:六名市场参与者表示，截至当天下午晚些时候，多种因素的综合作用在上海和北京的交易室中引发了恐惧和混乱。

Eventually, the People's Bank of China (PBOC), its affiliated China Foreign Exchange Trade System (CFETS) and bond clearing houses stepped in, directing lenders, extending trading hours and holding meetings with institutions to calm markets.翻译:最终，中国人民银行（PBOC）、其下属的中国外汇交易中心（CFETS）和债券清算所介入，指导贷款机构、延长交易时间并与机构召开会议以安抚市场。

The contributing factors were the usual month-end demand for liquidity, cash hoarding in the lead up to a big government bond sale and a market where the biggest banks were already reticent to lend because of a mandate to counter pressure on the yuan.翻译:促成因素包括通常的月底流动性需求、大规模政府债券发行前的现金囤积，以及市场上最大的银行因受制于应对人民币压力的任务而不愿放贷。

"It was an accident," said Xia Chun, chief economist at wealth manager Yintech Investment Holdings, calling it an unforeseen consequence of the government's heavy hand in financial markets.翻译:财富管理公司银科投资控股有限公司首席经济学家夏春表示，“这是一次意外”，他称这是政府对金融市场的大力干预造成的不可预见的后果。

"Banks were grudging in lending, leaving non-banks asking each other for money in afternoon trade," he said. "Borrowing rates surged as a result, with some willing to take any price."翻译:“银行在放贷方面不情愿，导致非银行机构在下午的交易中互相要钱，”他说。 “借贷利率因此飙升，有些人愿意不惜一切代价。”

The reasons for the spike in interest rates and the ensuing market chaos are detailed here for the first time. Participants say that the vulnerability exposed will stay as long as capital outflows keep the system under pressure.翻译:这里首次详述了利率飙升和随之而来的市场混乱的原因。参与者表示，只要资本外流使系统承受压力，暴露的脆弱性就会持续存在。

Most of them requested anonymity as they were not authorised to discuss a sensitive topic publicly.翻译:他们中的大多数人要求匿名，因为他们无权公开讨论敏感话题。

The PBOC told Reuters that CFETS was probing "abnormal" trades on Oct. 31 involving some accounts repeatedly borrowing and lending money at "extremely high interest rates" near the end of trading hours.

'COMBAT MOOD'

Short-term financing markets, such as overnight repurchase agreements, or repos, are crucial to the daily business of banks, insurers and other financial institutions.翻译:隔夜回购协议等短期融资市场对于银行、保险公司和其他金融机构的日常业务至关重要。

They affect foreign exchange movements since the markets are the major avenue for the supply of money.翻译:它们影响外汇变动，因为市场是货币供应的主要渠道。

Funds and non-banks borrow and roll over loans that finance their investments and trades in the repo market. The month-end is also when banks and other finance-sector participants have to square their books and comply with rules on capital buffers.翻译:基金和非银行机构借入并展期贷款，为其在回购市场上的投资和交易提供资金。月底也是银行和其他金融部门参与者必须整理账目并遵守资本缓冲规则的时候。

Disruptions, therefore, can threaten financial stability.翻译:因此，混乱可能会威胁金融稳定。

Seeds of trouble were sown in October when China approved one trillion yuan ($137.32 billion) in sovereign debt sales, to be rolled out - according to sources familiar with the plans - by sticking to the issuance schedule for the fourth quarter but increasing the size of each tranche.翻译:据知情人士透露，10 月份中国批准发行 1 万亿元人民币（合 1,373.2 亿美元）的主权债务，此举埋下了麻烦的种子。每个批次。

Typically, said one fund manager in Shanghai, in such situations the PBOC would offset the cash drain from the extra bond issuance with extra funding support - for example by relaxing bank reserve requirements.翻译:上海的一位基金经理表示，通常情况下，在这种情况下，中国人民银行会通过额外的资金支持来抵消额外发行债券造成的现金流失，例如放宽银行准备金要求。

But putting extra cash into the system would risk adding downward pressure on the yuan - which has lost over 5% against the dollar this year - and undercut months of efforts to stabilise the currency.翻译:但向该体系注入额外现金可能会增加人民币贬值的风险——人民币兑美元汇率今年已贬值超过5%——并削弱数月来稳定人民币汇率的努力。

"The inaction by the central bank is mainly due to its concern over yuan depreciation," said the fund manager, who declined to be identified as he was not authorised to talk to media.翻译:“央行不作为主要是因为担心人民币贬值，”该基金经理表示。由于无权接受媒体采访，该基金经理拒绝透露姓名。

On trading floors that Tuesday, the scramble for short-term funds became a stampede.翻译:那周二的交易大厅里，短期资金的争夺变成了踩踏事件。

Even repo rates between banks, normally stable and the main gauge of short-term funding costs, flew from an overnight rate of 2% a day earlier to as high as 8% on Oct. 31.

DESPERATE BORROWERS

At 4 p.m. (0800 GMT) the state banks that normally lend to desperate last-minute borrowers were missing, according to three market participants.翻译:据三名市场参与者称，下午 4 点（格林威治标准时间 0800），通常向绝望的最后一刻借款人提供贷款的国有银行失踪了。

The absence left a couple of desperate borrowers paying 30%-50% - rates not seen since defaults at China Everbright Bank (601818.SS) and Industrial bank Co Ltd (601166.SS) a decade ago - to secure the loans they needed.翻译:由于缺席，一些绝望的借款人支付了30%-50%的利率——自十年前中国光大银行(601818.SS)和兴业银行股份有限公司(601166.SS)违约以来从未见过的利率——以获得他们所需的贷款。

At 5 p.m. markets closed with positions unfunded and trades incomplete.翻译:下午 5 点，市场收盘，持仓资金不足，交易未完成。

"No one left the trading desk, as you don't know how things will go ... the whole trading room was in combat mood," said one fund manager in Beijing.翻译:北京一位基金经理表示：“没有人离开交易柜台，因为你不知道事情会如何发展……整个交易室都处于战斗情绪中。”

"If you need to square your positions in such an environment, and want to avoid default, you need to borrow at high rates," the fund manager said. "For each individual, it's rational behaviour."翻译:“如果你需要在这样的环境下平仓，并希望避免违约，你需要以高利率借款，”该基金经理表示。 “对于每个人来说，这是理性行为。”

The PBOC stepped into the breach, asking state banks to supply funds while the China Central Depository & Clearing Co (CCDC) and Shanghai Clearing House both reopened settlements at 6 p.m in an emergency response. By 8.30 p.m., crisis was averted and the market cleared and closed again.

DO NOT 'BE EMOTIONAL'

At a follow-up meeting with banks and brokers the next day, sources said the PBOC told institutions their behaviour was "disturbing the market" and that they should not "be emotional."翻译:在第二天与银行和经纪商举行的后续会议上，消息人士称，中国人民银行告诉机构，他们的行为“扰乱市场”，他们不应该“情绪激动”。

The money market operator CFETS told traders to keep a 5% ceiling on repo transactions and said anyone involved in high-rate deals closed on Oct. 31 would need to explain themselves to regulators, according to sources who received the notice.翻译:据收到通知的消息人士称，货币市场运营商 CFETS 要求交易员对回购交易保持 5% 的上限，并表示任何参与 10 月 31 日结束的高利率交易的人都需要向监管机构作出解释。

Fear subsided with overnight rates falling back below 3%. To be sure, most see the danger as having passed.翻译:随着隔夜利率回落至 3% 以下，恐慌情绪逐渐消退。可以肯定的是，大多数人认为危险已经过去。

But analysts have turned to the backdrop - intensifying control over China's currency - as an underlying source of tension.翻译:但分析人士已将加强对人民币汇率的控制视为紧张局势的潜在根源。

China's economic rebound from the COVID-19 pandemic has been a disappointment. Together with rate rises around the world, it has fanned capital outflows and the yuan has suffered.翻译:中国经济从新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行中复苏的情况令人失望。加上全球范围内的加息，加剧了资本外流，人民币也受到影响。

And yet, after dropping 5% on the dollar over the year to mid-August, the exchange rate has been conspicuously steady since as efforts from state-bank buying to new rules discouraging short selling have been deployed to support it.翻译:然而，截至 8 月中旬，美元兑美元汇率在一年内下跌 5% 后，此后随着国家银行购买行为和禁止卖空的新规则等措施的出台，该汇率一直明显稳定。

Tighter liquidity is another method.翻译:收紧流动性是另一种方法。

"If the pattern of money supply and liquidity provision remains unchanged, the whole system remains fragile. Another liquidity shock is always possible," said the Beijing-based fund manager.翻译:“如果货币供应和流动性供给的模式保持不变，整个体系仍然脆弱。另一场流动性冲击总是有可能的，”这位驻北京的基金经理表示。

Others see less risk, but expect tightness will stay as long as there is pressure on the currency. Broad dollar weakness has helped the yuan lately, but at 7.28 to the dollar it is not far from September's 16-year low of 7.351.翻译:其他人则认为风险较小，但预计只要货币面临压力，紧缩状况就会持续下去。美元普遍疲软最近对人民币汇率有所帮助，但人民币兑美元汇率为 7.28，距离 9 月份的 16 年低点 7.351 不远。

($1 = 7.2822 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2822 人民币）

item.title: 市场等待中国数据来衡量需求，油价下跌
item.description:
Oil prices eased on Tuesday, giving up most of the gains from the previous day, on concerns over weak demand in China, with investors focusing on trade data due later in the day to gauge demand from the world's second-largest oil consumer.翻译:由于对中国需求疲软的担忧，油价周二下跌，回吐了前一天的大部分涨幅，投资者关注当天晚些时候公布的贸易数据，以衡量全球第二大石油消费国的需求。

Brent crude futures fell 23 cents, or 0.3%, to $84.95 a barrel by 0127 GMT while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was at $80.59 a barrel, down 23 cents, or 0.3%.翻译:截至 GMT 0127，布伦特原油期货下跌 23 美分，至每桶 84.95 美元，跌幅为 0.3%，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货价格为每桶 80.59 美元，下跌 23 美分，跌幅为 0.3%。

Both benchmarks gained about 30 cents on Monday after top exporters Saudi Arabia and Russia reaffirmed their commitment to extra voluntary oil supply cuts until the end of the year.翻译:在主要出口国沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯重申其在年底前额外自愿削减石油供应的承诺后，周一两个基准均上涨约 30 美分。

"Oil prices were supported by continued output cuts by Saudi and Russia the previous day but investors' attention has shifted to demand, especially in China," said Toshitaka Tazawa, an analyst at Fujitomi Securities, noting all eyes are on data from China this week.翻译:富士富证券分析师 Toshitaka Tazawa 表示：“前一天沙特和俄罗斯持续减产支撑了油价，但投资者的注意力已转向需求，尤其是中国的需求。”他指出，本周所有目光都集中在中国的数据上。

China will release its import and export figures for October on Tuesday at 0300 GMT, while key consumer price inflation (CPI) data is due on Thursday.翻译:中国将于格林威治标准时间周二 0300 发布 10 月份进出口数据，而重要的消费者价格通胀 (CPI) 数据将于周四公布。

"We expect to see a tug-of-war at the levels near the current oil prices going forward, while digesting news on both supply and demand sides," Tazawa said, adding the trend may change dramatically if the Middle East situation becomes more tense.翻译:田泽表示：“我们预计未来油价将在当前油价水平附近展开拉锯战，同时消化供需双方的消息。”他补充说，如果中东局势变得更加紧张，这一趋势可能会发生巨大变化。

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel would consider "tactical little pauses" in Gaza fighting to facilitate the entry of aid or the exit of hostages, but again rejected calls for a general ceasefire despite growing international pressure.翻译:以色列总理本杰明·内塔尼亚胡表示，以色列将考虑在加沙的战斗中进行“战术上的小暂停”，以方便援助进入或人质撤离，但尽管国际压力不断加大，但以色列再次拒绝了全面停火的呼吁。

Saudi Arabia confirmed on Sunday it would continue with its additional voluntary cut of 1 million barrels per day (bpd) translating into production of about 9 million bpd for December, a source at the ministry of energy said in a statement.翻译:沙特能源部消息人士在一份声明中表示，周日，沙特阿拉伯确认将继续额外自愿减产100 万桶/日，12 月份产量将减少约 900 万桶/日。

Moscow also announced it would continue its additional voluntary supply cut of 300,000 bpd from its crude oil and petroleum product exports until the end of December.翻译:莫斯科还宣布，将继续自愿额外削减原油和石油产品出口量 30 万桶/日，直至 12 月底。

Also on supply side, Venezuela's state-owned PDVSA is in talks with local and foreign oilfield firms to hire equipment and services that would allow it to revive depressed output, sources close to the meetings said, after the U.S. relaxed sanctions on the country.翻译:同样在供应方面，知情人士称，在美国放松对该国制裁后，委内瑞拉国有石油公司 PDVSA 正在与当地和外国油田公司进行谈判，以租用设备和服务，以重振低迷的产量。

(This story has been corrected to remove 'bank lending, credit' reference, as the timing for the data release has not been set, in paragraph 5)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，删除了“银行贷款、信贷”的提及，因为数据发布的时间尚未确定，在第 5 段中）

item.title: 黑龙江省健身馆倒塌事故已造成3人死亡
item.description:
Three people were killed and one injured after a structural collapse at a fitness club in northeast China's Heilongjiang province, local officials said on Tuesday.翻译:当地官员周二表示，中国东北黑龙江省一健身俱乐部发生结构倒塌事故，造成三人死亡、一人受伤。

Government officials and state media said seven people were in the Yuecheng Fitness Gymnasium in Jiamusi city, Huanan County, when it collapsed late on Monday.翻译:政府官员和官方媒体称，周一晚间，桦南县佳木斯市悦城健身馆发生倒塌事故，当时有七人在场。

Officials said rescue operations have ended.翻译:官员称救援行动已经结束。

Initial reports said three people, possibly children, were at the venue or trapped inside when it collapsed. State media said the incident occurred at 7:20 p.m. (1120 GMT).翻译:初步报告称，倒塌时，现场有三人（可能是儿童）在现场或被困在里面。官方媒体称，事件发生在晚上 7 点 20 分（格林威治标准时间 1120）。

According to a local resident, the collapsed gymnasium is a basketball arena where youth basketball training is held, Global Times reported late Monday.翻译:据《环球时报》周一晚间报道，当地居民称，倒塌的体育馆是一个篮球场，用于进行青少年篮球训练。

Video images on social media showed a concrete structure caved in and covered by snowfall. Another video from The Paper, a Shanghai government-run media outlet, showed a woman running toward the collapsed area while crying and shouting "my son is still inside".翻译:社交媒体上的视频图像显示，一座混凝土结构塌陷并被降雪覆盖。上海官方媒体澎湃新闻的另一段视频显示，一名妇女一边哭一边跑向倒塌区域，大喊“我儿子还在里面”。

The venue where the accident occurred belongs to the New Sunshine Fitness Club in Huanan County, according to the county government. The club could not be immediately reached for comment.翻译:据县政府介绍，事故发生地点属于桦南县新阳光健身俱乐部。记者未能立即联系到该俱乐部置评。

The cause of the accident is under investigation, officials said, and the person in charge of the gym, also managed by New Sunshine, has been detained by the police.翻译:官方称，事故原因正在调查中，同为新阳光管理的健身房负责人已被警方拘留。

It was not immediately known what caused the collapse, but the country's northernmost province was slammed by harsh cold and blizzard weather throughout Monday that wreaked havoc on public transportation and closed schools.翻译:目前尚不清楚导致倒塌的原因，但该国最北端的省份整个周一都遭受严寒和暴风雪天气的袭击，对公共交通造成严重破坏，学校关闭。

More blizzard conditions are expected on Tuesday in Heilongjiang, including Jiamusi, CCTV news said, with warnings of icy roads, downed power lines and other snow-related obstructions.翻译:据央视新闻报道，周二，包括佳木斯在内的黑龙江省预计将出现更多暴风雪，并发出道路结冰、电线倒塌和其他与雪有关的障碍物的警告。

In July, 11 people were killed after the concrete roof of a school gymnasium in China's Qiqihar city collapsed.翻译:7月，中国齐齐哈尔市一所学校体育馆的混凝土屋顶倒塌，造成11人死亡。

Authorities had said that collapse was due to construction materials weighing on the roof. Heavy rains had drenched the region for several days.翻译:当局表示，倒塌是由于建筑材料压在屋顶上造成的。连日来，该地区一直下大雨。

"I remember that safety inspections were conducted on various gymnasiums after the Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School gymnasium collapsed in July," said a netizen on China's Weibo social media platform. "What was found? Another gymnasium collapse occurred in three months."翻译:“我记得7月份齐齐哈尔三十四中体育馆倒塌后，对各个体育馆进行了安全检查，”中国微博社交媒体平台上的一位网友说。 “发现了什么？三个月后又发生了一起体育馆倒塌事故。”

item.title: 参议员以中国为由敦促美国采取措施提高电池产量
item.description:
Two influential Democratic U.S. senators urged the Energy Department to take steps to boost U.S. battery manufacturing and next-generation battery research, citing China's dominance and export controls, according to a letter seen by Reuters.翻译:路透社看到的一封信显示，两位有影响力的美国民主党参议员敦促能源部采取措施促进美国电池制造和下一代电池研究，理由是中国的主导地位和出口管制。

Senate Intelligence Committee Chair Mark Warner and Energy Committee Chair Joe Manchin cited experts saying that the United States is "ten to twenty years behind Asia in commercialization of battery technology," and noted that China accounts for more than 75% of battery cell production.翻译:参议院情报委员会主席马克·沃纳和能源委员会主席乔·曼钦援引专家的话称，美国“在电池技术商业化方面落后亚洲十到二十年”，并指出中国占电池产量的75%以上。

"The U.S. must become a leader in manufacturing batteries and battery components, while securing our supply chains for the materials that make up those components," the senators wrote in a previously unreported letter seen by Reuters, citing China's decision last month to restrict exports of graphite, critical to manufacturing battery anodes.翻译:参议员们在路透社看到的一封此前未报道的信中写道：“美国必须成为电池和电池组件制造领域的领导者，同时确保我们构成这些组件的材料的供应链安全。”信中援引了中国上个月限制电池出口的决定。石墨，对于制造电池阳极至关重要。

China dominates the global EV battery supply chain including production of graphite - the single largest component.翻译:中国在全球电动汽车电池供应链中占据主导地位，其中包括最大的单一零部件石墨的生产。

The letter noted in 2022 the United States produced less than 10% of lithium-ion batteries in 2022 and said demand is expected to grow over seven times by 2035.翻译:信中指出，2022年美国锂离子电池产量不足10%，并表示到2035年需求预计将增长七倍以上。

The letter wants a committee briefing by Dec. 1 "on ongoing research and development of next-generation battery technologies."翻译:这封信希望委员会在 12 月 1 日之前就“正在进行的下一代电池技术的研究和开发”进行简报。

Lithium-ion batteries, the Pentagon has said, are crucial to thousands of military systems from "handheld radios, to unmanned submersibles and to future capabilities like lasers, directed energy weapons and hybrid electric tactical vehicles," the letter noted.翻译:信中指出，五角大楼表示，锂离子电池对数千个军事系统至关重要，从“手持无线电到无人潜水器，再到激光、定向能武器和混合电动战术车辆等未来功能”。

China accounts for 70% of the global production of lithium-ion batteries, the letter said, noting of five critical minerals required for most lithium-ion batteries, China "controls between 60-100% of the mining or refining for these minerals."翻译:信中称，中国占全球锂离子电池产量的70%，并指出，在大多数锂离子电池所需的五种关键矿物中，中国“控制着这些矿物60-100%的开采或精炼”。

The letter also said "it is critical that the U.S. lead in next-generation battery technology and alternative chemistries" and coordinate with the Department of Defense and other national security agencies "to support procurement of innovative, U.S.-developed energy storage technologies."翻译:信中还表示，“美国在下一代电池技术和替代化学物质方面处于领先地位”，并与国防部和其他国家安全机构协调“以支持采购美国开发的创新能源存储技术”。

A spokesperson for Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:能源部长詹妮弗·格兰霍姆的发言人没有立即回应置评请求。

item.title: 欧盟布雷顿要求 TikTok 首席执行官“不遗余力”打击虚假信息
item.description:
TikTok must "spare no effort" to counter the spread of disinformation on the short video sharing app, EU industry chief Thierry Breton told the company's CEO on Monday, as the European Union steps up its efforts to curb the powers of Big Tech.翻译:欧盟行业负责人蒂埃里·布雷顿(Thierry Breton)周一对TikTok首席执行官表示，随着欧盟加大力度遏制大型科技公司的权力，TikTok必须“不遗余力”打击短视频共享应用程序上虚假信息的传播。

Breton last month gave TikTok, owned by China's ByteDance, an Oct. 25 deadline to provide information on its crisis response measures and also ordered the company to provide details by Nov. 8 on how it protects the integrity of elections and minors online on its platform.翻译:布雷顿上个月给中国字节跳动旗下的 TikTok 规定了 10 月 25 日的最后期限，要求其提供有关其危机应对措施的信息，并命令该公司在 11 月 8 日之前提供有关如何在其平台上保护选举和未成年人在线的完整性的详细信息。

The European Commissioner pointed to changes on TikTok's platform in the past months with new features to protect users and investments made in content moderation and trust and safety.翻译:欧盟专员指出，过去几个月 TikTok 平台发生了变化，推出了保护用户的新功能以及在内容审核、信任和安全方面的投资。

"My services and I are now investigating whether this is enough to ensure compliance with the DSA (Digital Services Act)," Breton told Reuters in written comments after a video call with TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew.翻译:在与 TikTok 首席执行官 Shou Zi Chew 进行视频通话后，布雷顿在书面评论中对路透社表示：“我和我的服务部门现在正在调查这是否足以确保遵守DSA（数字服务法） 。”

"Because now more than ever, we must spare no effort to protect our citizens – especially children and teenagers – against illegal content and disinformation," he said.翻译:他说：“因为现在我们比以往任何时候都更必须不遗余力地保护我们的公民，特别是儿童和青少年，免受非法内容和虚假信息的侵害。”

TikTok Public Policy Director Caroline Greer said in a post on social media platform X that the company was pleased that Breton recognised its compliance efforts.翻译:TikTok 公共政策总监 Caroline Greer 在社交媒体平台 X 上发帖表示，公司很高兴 Breton 认可其合规努力。

The DSA requires large online platforms to do more to tackle illegal and harmful online content on their platforms. It is one of a slew of recent EU rules aimed at reining in the power of Big Tech.翻译:DSA 要求大型网络平台采取更多措施，打击其平台上的非法和有害网络内容。这是欧盟最近出台的一系列旨在限制大型科技公司权力的规则之一。

Chew is scheduled to meet EU Vice-President for Values and Transparency, Vera Jourova, and EU antitrust head Didier Ryenders in Brussels on Tuesday.翻译:周计划于周二在布鲁塞尔会见欧盟负责价值观和透明度的副主席维拉·朱罗娃（Vera Jourova）和欧盟反垄断负责人迪迪埃·赖恩德斯（Didier Ryenders）。

item.title: 2000-2021年中国借出1.34万亿美元，重点从“一带一路”转向救助金融报告
item.description:
Chinese financial institutions lent $1.34 trillion to developing countries from 2000 to 2021, U.S. researchers at AidData said in a report that showed the world's biggest bilateral lender switching from infrastructure to rescue lending.翻译:AidData的美国研究人员在一份报告中表示，从2000年到2021年，中国金融机构向发展中国家提供了1.34万亿美元的贷款，该报告显示全球最大的双边贷款机构从基础设施贷款转向救援贷款。

While lending commitments peaked at almost $136 billion in 2016, China still committed to almost $80 billion of loans and grants in 2021 according to the data, which captures almost 21,000 projects in 165 low and middle income countries as probably the most comprehensive dataset of its type.翻译:数据显示，虽然贷款承诺在 2016 年达到近 1,360 亿美元的峰值，但中国仍承诺在 2021 年提供近 800 亿美元的贷款和赠款，该数据涵盖了 165 个低收入和中等收入国家的近 21,000 个项目，这可能是同类数据中最全面的数据集。

Overseas finance has won Beijing allies across the developing world, while drawing criticism from the West and in some recipient countries, including Sri Lanka and Zambia, that infrastructure projects it funded saddled them with debt they were unable to repay.翻译:海外融资在发展中国家赢得了北京的盟友，但也引起了西方和斯里兰卡和赞比亚等一些受援国的批评，称其资助的基础设施项目让这些国家背负了无法偿还的债务。

Both the sources and the focus of China's overseas financing, have changed, the data showed.翻译:数据显示，中国海外融资的来源和重点都发生了变化。

In 2013, when President Xi Jinping launched the Belt and Road Initiative to build infrastructure across the developing world, China's policy banks accounted for over half of the lending. Their share started falling from 2015 and was 22% by 2021.翻译:2013年，当习近平主席发起“ 一带一路”倡议以在发展中国家建设基础设施时，中国的政策性银行占了贷款的一半以上。他们的份额从 2015 年开始下降，到 2021 年降至 22%。

The People's Bank of China and the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE), which manages China's foreign currency reserves, accounted for more than half of lending in 2021, almost all bailout lending.翻译:管理中国外汇储备的中国人民银行和国家外汇管理局（SAFE）占2021年贷款的一半以上，几乎全部是救助贷款。

"Beijing is navigating an unfamiliar and uncomfortable role— as the world's largest official debt collector," said the report by AidData, a research lab at William and Mary university.翻译:威廉玛丽大学研究实验室 AidData 的报告称，“北京正在扮演一个陌生且令人不安的角色——作为世界上最大的官方收债人。”

Much of China's growing rescue lending is denominated in renminbi, the report found, with loans in the Chinese currency overtaking U.S. dollars in 2020. Overdue payments to Chinese lenders have also risen.翻译:报告发现，中国不断增长的救援贷款大部分以人民币计价，到2020年，人民币贷款将超过美元。​​中国银行的逾期付款也有所增加。

One way China is managing repayment risk is through foreign currency cash escrow accounts it controls, AidData said. The arrangement is controversial because it gives China debt seniority, meaning other lenders, including multilateral development banks, could get paid second during any coordinated debt relief.翻译:AidData 表示，中国管理还款风险的一种方式是通过其控制的外币现金托管账户。这一安排颇具争议，因为它赋予中国债务优先权，这意味着包括多边开发银行在内的其他贷款机构可能在任何协调债务减免期间获得第二位偿付。

AidData identified 15 countries, primarily in Africa, with escrow accounts totalling a combined $2.5 billion at their peak in June 2023.翻译:AidData 确定了 15 个国家（主要是非洲国家）的托管账户总额在 2023 年 6 月达到峰值时达到 25 亿美元。

Brad Parks, the study's lead author, said they were not able to identify all such accounts, as they are normally kept private. He noted, though, that they had found collateralised loans worth $614 billion and that cash was the main source of collateral required by Chinese lenders, indicating that the amount in escrow accounts could be far higher than $2.5 billion.翻译:该研究的主要作者布拉德·帕克斯 (Brad Parks) 表示，他们无法识别所有此类帐户，因为这些帐户通常都是保密的。不过，他指出，他们发现了价值 6140 亿美元的抵押贷款，而现金是中国贷方所需抵押品的主要来源，这表明托管账户中的金额可能远远高于 25 亿美元。

China is also working more with multilateral lenders and Western commercial banks. Half of its non-emergency lending in 2021 was syndicated loans, 80% of that alongside Western banks and international financial institutions.翻译:中国还与多边贷款机构和西方商业银行开展更多合作。 2021 年，其非紧急贷款中有一半是银团贷款，其中 80% 是与西方银行和国际金融机构合作的。

The destinations of Chinese overseas lending have also changed. Loan commitments to African countries fell from 31% of the total in 2018 to 12% in 2021, while lending to European countries almost quadrupled to 23%.翻译:中国海外贷款的目的地也发生了变化。对非洲国家的贷款承诺从 2018 年占贷款总额的 31% 下降到 2021 年的 12%，而对欧洲国家的贷款几乎翻了两番，达到 23%。

A different dataset showed loan commitments to African countries falling to a 20-year low in 2022.翻译:另一个数据集显示，2022 年对非洲国家的贷款承诺降至20 年来的最低点。

item.title: 欧洲的目标是太空发射协议中的竞争性重组
item.description:
Europe on Monday challenged the private sector to develop services for small rockets that could guide future space reform, while stabilising finances for troubled medium and heavyweight launchers for the coming decade.翻译:欧洲周一要求私营部门开发小型火箭服务，以指导未来的太空改革，同时稳定未来十年陷入困境的中型和重型运载火箭的财务状况。

The head of the European Space Agency (ESA) said the decision to foster competition had long-term implications for the industry, which is wrestling with a short-term gap in space access due to delays and technical setbacks with Ariane 6 and Vega-C rockets.翻译:欧洲航天局 (ESA) 负责人表示，促进竞争的决定对该行业产生了长期影响，由于阿丽亚娜 6 号和织女星 C 的延误和技术挫折，该行业正在努力解决太空准入方面的短期差距。火箭。

"We are in the midst of a paradigm shift for space transportation," Director General Josef Aschbacher said halfway through two days of space talks in Seville, Spain.翻译:“我们正处于太空运输范式转变之中，”总干事约瑟夫·阿施巴赫在西班牙塞维利亚举行的为期两天的太空会谈中途说道。

The announcement marks a new departure for the 22-nation agency which has previously designed and procured launchers and wants to move towards a leaner system of buying services to help Europe mimic the runaway growth of rivals like Elon Musk's SpaceX.翻译:这一公告标志着这家由 22 个国家组成的机构的新起点，该机构此前曾设计和采购发射器，并希望转向更精简的购买服务系统，以帮助欧洲模仿埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX等竞争对手的快速增长。

"The launcher challenge...will lower the cost of public funding and stimulate a new market for European space entrepreneurs," Aschbacher told ministers.翻译:“发射器挑战……将降低公共资金成本，并为欧洲航天企业家刺激新市场，”阿施巴赫告诉部长们。

Such projects would start with a new generation of mini-launchers but could set the tone for longer-term replacements for Europe's heavier Ariane 6 and Vega-C, which remain Europe's only independent options for major payloads in coming years.翻译:此类项目将从新一代迷你发射器开始，但可能为欧洲较重的阿丽亚娜 6 和织女星 C 的长期替代奠定了基调，这仍然是欧洲未来几年主要有效载荷的唯一独立选择。

"It's a mini-revolution because what they want to do now is buy a service," said Antoine Meunier, author of a recent book on the "long road" to European crewed space flight.翻译:“这是一场小型革命，因为他们现在想做的是购买服务，”安托万·莫尼耶（Antoine Meunier）说，他最近出版了一本关于欧洲载人航天“漫长道路”的书。

The move is part of a broader deal easing months of tensions after France lobbied for more support for Ariane 6, Germany pressed for competition in the France-led launch sector and Italy demanded a bigger say on its domestically produced Vega-C.

LAUNCHER DEAL

In a side declaration, France, Germany and Italy took credit for breaking deadlock and forging an agreement backed by other ESA nations, though delegates said all 22 nations had a role.翻译:在一份侧面声明中，法国、德国和意大利因打破僵局并达成了其他欧空局国家支持的协议而受到赞誉，不过代表们表示，所有 22 个国家都发挥了作用。

"We have a stable future for heavy and medium-sized launchers. This is a big relief because a few days ago we did not have this situation yet," Aschbacher told reporters.翻译:“我们对于重型和中型发射器有一个稳定的未来。这让人松了一口气，因为几天前我们还没有出现这种情况，”阿施巴赫告诉记者。

The deal means countries involved in existing launchers will provide up to 340 million euros ($364.48 million) of annual support for Ariane 6 and 21 million euros for Vega-C from 2026, to help close a gap between rising costs and market prices.翻译:该协议意味着，从 2026 年起，参与现有发射器的国家将为阿丽亚娜 6 提供高达 3.4 亿欧元（3.6448 亿美元）的年度支持，为 Vega-C 提供高达 2100 万欧元的支持，以帮助缩小不断上升的成本与市场价格之间的差距。

They also guaranteed four institutional launches a year for Ariane 6 and three for Vega-C.翻译:他们还保证每年四次机构发射 Ariane 6 和 3 次 Vega-C。

The agreement secures a second batch of Ariane 6 launches from flights 16 to 42 after previous commitments covered an inaugural test flight and 14 commercial launches. That will give Airbus and other contractors more confidence to order parts.翻译:继之前的承诺包括首次试飞和 14 次商业发射后，该协议确保从第 16 至 42 次航班进行第二批阿丽亚娜 6 号发射。这将使空客和其他承包商更有信心订购零件。

In return, the industry will have to cut costs by 11%, French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire told reporters. Ariane 6 is built by Airbus-Safran (AIR.PA), (SAF.PA) venture ArianeGroup.翻译:法国财政部长布鲁诺·勒梅尔 (Bruno Le Maire) 告诉记者，作为回报，该行业必须削减 11% 的成本。阿丽亚娜 6 由空中客车赛峰集团(AIR.PA) (SAF.PA)合资企业阿丽亚娜集团 (ArianeGroup) 建造。

Italy said earlier the deal could also lead to Vega-C being operated by Italian manufacturer Avio (AVI.MI) in addition to Arianespace, which is currently the sole European operator.翻译:意大利早些时候表示，除了目前唯一的欧洲运营商 Arianespace 之外，该交易还可能导致 Vega-C 由意大利制造商 Avio (AVI.MI)运营。

Ministers also agreed to breathe new life into exploration by inviting private funding for a potential space plane to ferry cargo to and from the International Space Station.翻译:部长们还同意邀请私人资金建造一架潜在的太空飞机，以在国际空间站之间运送货物，从而为探索注入新的活力。

Until now, Europe has carved out a leading role in climate and scientific observation but rarely targeted a prime role in human exploration - opting instead for a junior role in projects led by U.S. space agency NASA or until recently Russia.翻译:到目前为止，欧洲已经在气候和科学观测方面发挥了主导作用，但很少在人类探索中发挥主要作用，而是选择在美国航天局或直到最近的俄罗斯领导的项目中扮演次要角色。

However the new initiative, backed by 75 million euros of public seed funding, fell short of recent calls by experts including former NATO Secretary General Anders Fogh Rasmussen for a radical European plan to catch up with dominant space powers like the U.S., Russia, China and increasingly India.翻译:然而，这项由 7500 万欧元公共种子资金支持的新举措，未能满足包括前北约秘书长安德斯·福格·拉斯穆森在内的专家最近的呼吁，要求欧洲采取一项激进的计划，以赶上美国、俄罗斯、中国和日本等主导太空强国。越来越印度。

Aschbacher, who has warned Europe against falling behind on space as it did on IT, described the plane as a "first step" and said it could be eventually be adapted to include human flight.翻译:阿施巴赫警告欧洲不要像在信息技术领域那样在太空领域落后，他将这架飞机描述为“第一步”，并表示它最终可能会适应载人飞行。

The proposal echoes the Hermes space plane, which never got off the drawing board. Europe's answer to the U.S. Space Shuttle was designed to carry three astronauts but was scrapped in 1992.翻译:该提案与从未脱离设计阶段的赫尔墨斯太空飞机相呼应。欧洲仿效美国航天飞机的设计目的是搭载三名宇航员，但于 1992 年被废弃。

($1 = 0.9328 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9328 欧元）

item.title: 早间竞价：数据洪流可能会浇灭本周开局的火热
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Jamie McGeever, financial markets columnist.翻译:金融市场专栏作家杰米·麦克吉弗 (Jamie McGeever) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

Tuesday will be one of the busiest days of the year for Asian markets in terms of top-tier regional economic data and events, and investors could not be going into it on a stronger footing.翻译:就顶级区域经济数据和事件而言，周二将是亚洲市场一年中最繁忙的日子之一，投资者不可能以更强劲的基础入市。

Asian and emerging market stocks rose more than 2% on Monday, bringing their gains over the last three trading sessions up to almost 6%.翻译:亚洲和新兴市场股市周一上涨超过 2%，过去三个交易日涨幅接近 6%。

This is their best run in a year, powered by easing financial conditions in the form of lower U.S. bond yields and a weaker dollar, and renewed faith in the U.S. economic 'soft landing' scenario.翻译:这是它们一年来最好的表现，其动力来自于美国债券收益率下降和美元疲软等金融环境的放松，以及人们对美国经济“软着陆”情景的新信心。

Aggregate financial conditions across emerging markets and in China have slumped in recent days to their loosest in nearly two months, or in the case of India, the easiest in three months, Goldman Sachs financial conditions indices show.翻译:高盛金融状况指数显示，新兴市场和中国的总体金融状况最近几天已降至近两个月来的最低水平，而印度的总体金融状况则为三个月来最宽松的水平。

South Korean shares got an added injection of rocket fuel on Monday, surging 5.7% in their biggest leap since early 2020 after authorities re-imposed a ban on short-selling through the first half of 2024 to promote a "level playing field".翻译:周一，韩国股市再次注入火箭燃料，飙升 5.7%，创下 2020 年初以来的最大涨幅，此前当局重新实施了 2024 年上半年的卖空禁令，以促进“公平竞争环境”。

Having under-performed global and developed market benchmarks last week, Asian stocks could be set to outperform this week. That is how markets played out on Monday, as the MSCI World Index and Wall Street eked out gains of no more than 0.3%.翻译:亚洲股市上周表现不佳，但本周可能会跑赢全球和发达市场基准。这就是周一市场的表现，MSCI 世界指数和华尔街的涨幅不超过 0.3%。

That may temper some of the bullishness across Asia on Tuesday, however, and there is certainly no shortage of event risk to keep investors and traders on their toes.翻译:然而，这可能会缓和周二整个亚洲的一些看涨情绪，而且肯定不乏让投资者和交易员保持警惕的事件风险。

Australia's central bank is expected to raise its benchmark cash rate by 25 basis points to 4.35%, the highest since 2011 and breaking a run of four meetings on hold. Sticky inflation is keeping a hawkish bias in Aussie money markets, which are pricing in at least one more quarter point hike next year.翻译:预计澳大利亚央行将基准现金利率上调25个基点至4.35%，为2011年以来的最高水平，并打破连续四次会议搁置的局面。粘性通胀使澳大利亚货币市场保持鹰派倾向，预计明年至少还会加息四分之一个百分点。

Also on Tuesday the Bank of Korea publishes the minutes from its last policy meeting, while on the data front consumer inflation figures from Taiwan and the Philippines, trade data from Taiwan, industrial production figures from Indonesia, and household spending figures from Japan are all on tap.翻译:同样在周二，韩国央行公布了上次政策会议纪要，而在数据方面，台湾和菲律宾的消费者通胀数据、台湾的贸易数据、印度尼西亚的工业生产数据以及日本的家庭支出数据都在公布。轻敲。

The big one, however, could be China's trade report for October. Steep year-on-year declines in imports and exports for most of this year - especially imports - have been a pretty good barometer of the overall economy's underlying weakness.翻译:然而，最重要的可能是中国十月份的贸易报告。今年大部分时间进出口同比大幅下降——尤其是进口——是整体经济潜在疲软的一个很好的晴雨表。

But a trough looks to have been reached, the trend is improving, and the economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter. China bulls will be hoping for more encouraging signs.翻译:但看起来已经触底，趋势正在改善，第三季度经济增长快于预期。看好中国的人士将希望看到更多令人鼓舞的迹象。

Skeptical foreign investors will need more than one month of slowing imports and exports decline though. Figures on Monday showed that China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment (FDI) since China's foreign exchange regulator began compiling the data in 1998.翻译:不过，持怀疑态度的外国投资者需要一个多月的时间来减缓进出口下滑。周一的数据显示，自中国外汇监管机构自1998年开始编制数据以来，中国首次出现外国直接投资(FDI)季度赤字。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Tuesday:翻译:以下是可能为周二市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- Australia central bank policy meeting翻译:- 澳大利亚央行政策会议

- China trade (October)翻译:- 中国贸易（10月）

- Japan household spending (September)翻译:- 日本家庭支出（九月）

item.title: 路透调查显示中国10月份贸易下滑可能进一步缓解
item.description:
China's exports likely fell more slowly for a third consecutive month in October, a Reuters poll showed, adding to signs that the economy is stabilising even if the trade performance remains weaker than it was before Beijing removed anti-COVID curbs.翻译:路透调查显示，中国10月份出口可能连续第三个月放缓，这进一步表明经济正在企稳，尽管贸易表现仍弱于北京取消新冠疫情限制措施之前。

Exports are expected to show a 3.3% fall in October from a year earlier, following a 6.2% drop in September, according to the median forecast of 34 economists polled.翻译:根据接受调查的 34 名经济学家的预测中位数，继 9 月份下降 6.2% 后，10 月份出口预计将同比下降 3.3%。

Recent economic indicators suggest the policy support measures introduced since June to shore up economic growth are beginning to take effect, although China's manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted again last month.翻译:近期经济指标显示，尽管中国制造业活动上个月再次意外收缩，但自6月份以来出台的支持经济增长的政策支持措施已开始发挥作用。

Policymakers are contending with a domestic property crisis, high youth unemployment, depressed private sector confidence, a slowdown in global growth and Sino-U.S. tensions over trade technology and geopolitics.翻译:政策制定者正在应对国内房地产危机、青年失业率高、私营部门信心低迷、全球经济增长放缓以及中美在贸易技术和地缘政治方面的紧张局势。

As a result, analysts anticipate policymakers will have to introduce further stimulus measures to ensure the economy hits Beijing's annual growth target of around 5%, not least because trade remains weaker than during the pandemic when the government deployed strict curbs on the movement of people and goods. Those curbs were finally removed in December 2022.翻译:因此，分析人士预计，政策制定者将不得不采取进一步的刺激措施，以确保经济达到北京设定的 5% 左右的年度增长目标，尤其是因为贸易仍然弱于疫情期间，当时政府对人员流动和人员流动采取了严格限制。商品。这些限制最终于 2022 年 12 月取消。

Economists at BNP Paribas projected that exports fell by just 1% last month, while Barclays returned the most pessimistic forecast that outbound shipments fell by 5.5% in October compared with the same period a year earlier.翻译:法国巴黎银行经济学家预测上个月出口仅下降1%，而巴克莱银行则返回了最悲观的预测，即10月份出境货运量较去年同期下降5.5%。

Both new export and import orders shrank for an eighth consecutive month in October, a sub-index in the official purchasing managers' index survey showed, suggesting that manufacturers are still struggling for buyers overseas and ordering fewer components used in finished goods for re-export.翻译:官方采购经理人指数调查的一项分项指数显示，10月份新出口和进口订单连续第八个月萎缩，这表明制造商仍在为海外买家而苦苦挣扎，并且订购用于再出口的制成品的零部件数量减少。

Global trade activities, represented by the Baltic Dry Index, reported falling demand in October as it dropped to its lowest rate since December 2020, owing to congestion in North American and European ports.翻译:以波罗的海干散货指数为代表的全球贸易活动报告称，由于北美和欧洲港口拥堵，10月份需求下降，跌至2020年12月以来的最低水平。

But South Korean exports to China, a leading indicator of China's imports, fell at their slowest pace in 13 months in October, dropping 9.5% compared with the same period last year.翻译:但韩国对中国的出口（中国进口的领先指标）10月份的跌幅为13个月以来最慢，与去年同期相比下降了9.5%。

China's imports are expected to have shrunk by 4.8%, after dropping 6.2% in September, reflecting improving domestic demand.翻译:中国进口继 9 月份下降 6.2% 后，预计将萎缩 4.8%，反映出内需改善。

The median estimate in the poll indicated that China's trade surplus would increase, with analysts predicting it will come in at $82.00 billion, compared with $77.71 billion in September.翻译:调查的中值估计显示，中国的贸易顺差将增加，分析师预测其贸易顺差将达到 820 亿美元，而 9 月份为 777.1 亿美元。

China's trade data will be released on Tuesday.翻译:中国贸易数据将于周二公布。

item.title: 美国财政部长耶伦将在亚太经合组织峰会前会见中国国务院副总理
item.description:
U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will meet with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng in San Francisco this week to try to deepen a fledgling economic dialogue between the world's two largest economies ahead of a U.S.-hosted summit of Pacific Rim leaders.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦本周将在旧金山会见中国国务院副总理何立峰，试图在美国主办的环太平洋地区领导人峰会之前深化世界最大两个经济体之间刚刚起步的经济对话。

The Treasury said on Monday the Nov. 9-10 meetings will also convene the new economic and financial forums launched in October by the Treasury and China's finance ministry and central bank.翻译:美国财政部周一表示，11 月 9 日至 10 日的会议还将召开由美国财政部、中国财政部和央行于 10 月发起的新经济和金融论坛。

Yellen first met with He, China's new economic czar, in July, when she visited Beijing to try to stabilize a deteriorating U.S.-China relationship amid growing U.S. restrictions on sensitive technologies.翻译:耶伦于7月份首次会见了中国新任经济沙皇贺建奎，当时她访问北京，试图在美国对敏感技术限制日益严格的情况下稳定不断恶化的中美关系。

The San Francisco meetings will take place just before the Biden administration hosts ministers and leaders of Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation countries from Nov. 11-17 -- a gathering during which U.S. President Joe Biden is aiming to meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping.翻译:旧金山会议将在拜登政府于 11 月 11 日至 17 日接待亚太经济合作组织国家部长和领导人之前举行，美国总统乔·拜登计划在这次聚会期间会见中国国家主席习近平。

A senior U.S. Treasury official downplayed the idea that there would be specific "deliverables" from the Yellen-He meetings, saying it was not a "policy trade" situation "where we trade one thing for another."翻译:一位美国财政部高级官员淡化了耶伦与贺会议将产生具体“成果”的想法，称这不是“我们以一物换另一物”的“政策贸易”情况。

But the official said a key aim for Yellen was gaining a better understanding of how the new U.S.-China economic communication line will work, and how to make sure that "it is not vulnerable to shocks," adding that there will be more frequent interactions.翻译:但这位官员表示，耶伦的一个关键目标是更好地了解新的美中经济沟通渠道将如何运作，以及如何确保“它不易受到冲击”，并补充说，双方的互动将会更加频繁。

Yellen also is keen to discuss what steps Chinese officials are contemplating to support their flagging economic growth, and what circumstances might change their policy path.

'NON-MARKET' TOOLS

Amid growing concerns that China will try to dump more manufactured goods on U.S. and global markets, Yellen is expected to warn He against using massive industrial subsidies to state firms and shutting U.S. companies out of domestic markets, the official said.翻译:这位官员表示，由于人们越来越担心中国将试图向美国和全球市场倾销更多制成品，预计耶伦将警告贺建奎不要对国有企业进行大规模工业补贴，并将美国企业拒之门外。

"This week, I will speak to my counterpart about our serious concerns with Beijing's unfair economic practices, including its large-scale use of non-market tools, its barriers to market access, and its coercive actions against U.S. firms in China," Yellen said in an opinion piece published by the Washington Post.翻译:耶伦表示：“本周，我将与我的同行谈论我们对北京不公平经济行为的严重关切，包括大规模使用非市场工具、市场准入壁垒以及对在华美国企业采取的强制行动。” 《华盛顿邮报》发表的一篇评论文章中说道。

She reiterated that the U.S. was seeking "healthy competition" with China and was not trying to "trigger a "disorderly wholesale private-sector pullback from China with actions to diversify supply chains and protect U.S. national security."翻译:她重申，美国正在寻求与中国的“良性竞争”，而不是试图“通过供应链多元化和保护美国国家安全的行动，引发“私营部门无序大规模撤出中国”。

A brief statement from a Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson said only that He would visit the U.S. from Nov. 8-12 at Yellen's invitation, describing him as China's "lead person for China-U.S. economic and trade affairs." It provided no details of any meetings.

NOT S&ED

The communications so far have helped U.S. officials to explain national security policies to counterparts in Beijing, including on export controls on sensitive technologies that could have military uses and restrictions on outbound U.S. investment to China.翻译:迄今为止的通信已帮助美国官员向北京同行解释国家安全政策，包括对可能用于军事用途的敏感技术的出口管制以及对美国对华投资的限制。

But Yellen said her engagement with He was not meant to reconstitute the broad, Obama-era U.S.-China Strategic and Economic Dialogue, which was widely criticized for its ineffectiveness.翻译:但耶伦表示，她与贺建奎的接触并不是为了重建奥巴马时代广泛的美中战略与经济对话，该对话因其无效而受到广泛批评。

Instead, Yellen said she was "focusing on specific, high-priority economic topics on which we can make tangible progress."翻译:相反，耶伦表示，她“专注于我们可以取得切实进展的具体、高度优先的经济主题”。

Among these are cooperating on global challenges such as tackling climate change, speeding debt relief to poor countries, and reducing illicit financial flows that support terrorism and the illegal drug trade.翻译:其中包括合作应对全球挑战，例如应对气候变化、加快减免穷国债务以及减少支持恐怖主义和非法毒品贸易的非法资金流动。

item.title: 在预期的峰会之前，民意调查对拜登的解读比对中国习近平的解读更好
item.description:
Ahead of an expected meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and China's President Xi Jinping next week, a U.S. think tank says data it has collected from two dozen countries shows the American leader is winning the battle for public opinion.翻译:在美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平下周预计会晤之前，一家美国智库表示，从二十几个国家收集的数据显示，这位美国领导人正在赢得舆论之战。

The Pew Research Center says it surveyed 30,861 adults in 24 countries between Feb. 20 and May 22 about their attitudes to the world's two largest economies and their leadership.翻译:皮尤研究中心表示，它在 2 月 20 日至 5 月 22 日期间对 24 个国家的 30,861 名成年人进行了调查，了解他们对世界最大的两个经济体及其领导力的态度。

"People in 23 countries tend to see U.S. President Joe Biden more positively than Chinese President Xi Jinping," it said in a report released on Monday. "A median of 54% have confidence in Biden to do the right thing regarding world affairs, compared with 19% who say the same of Xi."翻译:该组织在周一发布的一份报告中表示，“23个国家的人们对美国总统乔·拜登的看法往往比中国国家主席习近平更积极”。 “中位数为 54% 的人相信拜登会在国际事务上做正确的事情，而对习近平持同样看法的人为 19%。”

Pew said it did not ask people in the United States about their confidence in Biden's handling of world affairs and says it is no longer able to conduct independent surveys in China, so does not survey there.翻译:皮尤表示，它没有询问美国民众对拜登处理国际事务的信心，并表示无法再在中国进行独立调查，因此不会在中国进行调查。

The countries surveyed were the United States, Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, India, Indonesia, Israel, Italy, Japan, Kenya, Mexico, the Netherlands, Nigeria, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Spain and Sweden.翻译:接受调查的国家包括美国、阿根廷、澳大利亚、巴西、英国、加拿大、法国、德国、希腊、匈牙利、印度、印度尼西亚、以色列、意大利、日本、肯尼亚、墨西哥、荷兰、尼日利亚、波兰、南非、韩国、西班牙和瑞典。

Pew said its findings showed China was seen unfavorably in North America, Europe, and Asia but more favorably in Africa and Latin America.翻译:皮尤研究中心表示，其调查结果显示，中国在北美、欧洲和亚洲的形象较差，但在非洲和拉丁美洲的形象较好。

The gap in favor of Biden tended to be quite large in high-income contries, but even in most middle-income countries more had confidence in Biden than Xi, with Indonesia and Hungary being notable exceptions. The leaders received nearly identical marks in those countries, Pew said.翻译:在高收入国家，支持拜登的差距往往相当大，但即使在大多数中等收入国家，对拜登的信心也高于对习近平的信心，印度尼西亚和匈牙利是明显的例外。皮尤表示，两位领导人在这些国家获得的分数几乎相同。

"This year, overall views of the United States are much more positive than views of China in most places surveyed," it said.翻译:报告称：“今年，大多数受访地区对美国的总体看法比对中国的看法要积极得多。”

"A median of 59% offer positive evaluations of the U.S., compared with a median of 28% who say the same of China."翻译:“对美国持积极评价的中位数为 59%，而对中国持积极评价的中位数为 28%。”

Pew said that in nearly two decades of its favorability polling, views of the countries have fluctuated alongside views of their leaders, but those of the U.S. under Biden had rebounded dramatically in many of the countries surveyed, while those of China were at their most negative levels.翻译:皮尤研究中心表示，在近二十年的好感度民意调查中，各国的看法随着其领导人的看法而波动，但在许多接受调查的国家中，拜登领导下的美国的好感度大幅反弹，而中国的好感度则处于最负面的时期。水平。

While majorities in most countries saw both the U.S. and China as prone to interfere in the affairs of other countries, the U.S. was almost always more likely to be described that way.翻译:尽管大多数国家的大多数人都认为美国和中国都倾向于干涉其他国家的事务，但美国几乎总是更有可能被这样描述。

However, the U.S. "gets higher marks for contributing to global peace and stability than China," the survey said.翻译:然而，调查称，美国“在对全球和平与稳定的贡献方面获得比中国更高的分数”。

"On balance, views of the U.S. are much more positive than views of China," Pew said.翻译:皮尤表示：“总的来说，美国的看法比中国的看法积极得多。”

Biden and Xi are expected to meet on the sidelines of the APEC summit in San Francisco next week, although China has yet to confirm this, and a senior Biden administration official said last week important details had still to be hammered out.翻译:拜登和习近平预计将于下周在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织峰会期间会面，尽管中国尚未证实这一点， 拜登政府一名高级官员上周表示，重要细节仍有待敲定。

item.title: 澳大利亚总理阿尔巴内斯表示与中国沟通很重要
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese told Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday that Australia has an interest in the continued stable growth of China's economy and its ongoing engagement with the world.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞周一在北京对中国国家主席习近平表示，中国经济的持续稳定增长及其与世界的持续接触符合澳大利亚的利益。

In opening remarks as the two leaders met at the Great Hall of the People, Albanese said a strong relationship between the two countries was "beneficial into the future".翻译:两国领导人在人民大会堂会面时，阿尔巴尼斯在开幕致辞中表示，两国之间牢固的关系“有利于未来”。

"Australia, along with other countries in the region, has an interest in continued stable growth in the Chinese economy, and its ongoing engagement with the world ," he said, according to an official transcript from the Australian Prime Minister's Office.翻译:根据澳大利亚总理办公室的官方记录，他表示：“澳大利亚与该地区其他国家一样，对中国经济的持续稳定增长及其与世界的持续接触感兴趣。”

Albanese said it was "important that we have communication" where differences arise.翻译:阿尔巴内塞表示，在出现分歧时“保持沟通非常重要”。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟要求阿里巴巴速卖通提供打击非法产品措施的细节
item.description:
The European Commission on Monday ordered Alibaba's (9988.HK) AliExpress to provide information on how it tackles illegal products, such as counterfeit goods, sold on its platform by Nov. 27 or face an investigation that could result in fines.翻译:欧盟委员会周一责令阿里巴巴（9988.HK）速卖通在 11 月 27 日之前提供有关如何处理其平台上销售的非法产品（例如假冒商品）的信息，否则将面临可能导致罚款的调查。

The EU executive said it had sent a request for information to AliExpress in line with newly adopted EU rules called the Digital Services Act (DSA), which requires Big Tech to do more to counter illegal and harmful content on their platforms.翻译:欧盟高管表示，已根据欧盟新通过的《数字服务法》(DSA) 规则向全球速卖通发出信息请求，该法案要求大型科技公司采取更多措施打击其平台上的非法和有害内容。

The Commission said it wants to know what measures AliExpress has taken to comply with DSA rules against the dissemination and sale of illegal products online, such as fake medicines.翻译:欧盟委员会表示，它想知道全球速卖通采取了哪些措施来遵守 DSA 规则，打击在线传播和销售假药等非法产品。

It said AliExpress must provide the requested information by Nov. 27 after which the Commission will assess its next steps.翻译:它表示速卖通必须在 11 月 27 日之前提供所要求的信息，之后委员会将评估其下一步行动。

"It (DSA) is also there to ensure removal of illegal or unsafe products sold in the EU via e-commerce platforms, including the growing number of fake and potentially life-threatening medicines and pharmaceuticals sold online," EU industry chief Thierry Breton said in a statement.翻译:欧盟行业负责人蒂埃里·布雷顿 (Thierry Breton) 表示：“DSA 还旨在确保清除通过电子商务平台在欧盟销售的非法或不安全产品，包括网上销售的假冒药品和可能危及生命的药品数量不断增加。”在一份声明中。

Breton has in recent weeks sent similar requests for information to Elon Musk's X platform, Meta Platforms (META.O) and TikTok, asking what they are doing to fight the spread of disinformation.翻译:最近几周，布雷顿向埃隆·马斯克的 X 平台、Meta Platforms (META.O)和 TikTok 发出了类似的信息请求，询问他们正在采取哪些措施来打击虚假信息的传播。

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示跨国公司计划采取行动尽量减少中国风险
item.description:
More than 40% of multinational firms surveyed by the European Central Bank expect to move production to politically friendlier countries in the coming years, with risk related to China cited as the main concern, a paper showed on Monday.翻译:周一的一份文件显示，接受欧洲央行调查的跨国公司中，超过 40% 预计未来几年将生产转移到政治上更加友好的国家，其中与中国相关的风险是主要担忧。

Firms have increasingly discussed shifting production sites after the pandemic and Russia's war in Ukraine disrupted value chains, but there has been little empirical evidence of mass relocations.翻译:在大流行和俄罗斯乌克兰战争扰乱价值链之后，企业越来越多地讨论转移生产地点，但几乎没有大规模搬迁的经验证据。

Seeking on-the-ground confirmation, the ECB surveyed 65 very large firms with a global footprint and 49% said they were looking to "near-shore", or bring production closer to the point of sales.翻译:为了寻求实地确认，欧洲央行对 65 家业务遍及全球的大型企业进行了调查，其中 49% 的企业表示，他们正在寻求“近岸”生产，或者使生产更接近销售点。

In total, 42% wanted to "friend-shore" some operations, or move them to more welcoming locations.翻译:总共有 42% 的受访者希望“友好支持”一些业务，或者将其转移到更受欢迎的地点。

"As to those countries which posed – or could pose – a risk to supply chains in their sector more generally, two-thirds of all respondents cited China," the ECB said in an Economic Bulletin article.翻译:欧洲央行在《经济公报》的一篇文章中表示：“对于那些对其行业供应链构成或可能构成风险的国家，三分之二的受访者提到了中国。”

More than half of the firms sourced critical materials from a specific country or small number of countries, and nearly all said that these supplies now faced elevated risk.翻译:超过一半的公司从特定国家或少数国家采购关键材料，几乎所有公司都表示这些供应现在面临更高的风险。

"A large majority of these identified China as that country, or one of those countries, with all of them considering this an elevated risk," the ECB added.翻译:欧洲央行补充说：“其中绝大多数将中国视为该国家或其中之一，他们都认为这是一个较高的风险。”

Near-shoring was already a tendency in recent years but friend-shoring is a new phenomenon as only 11% said they were already pursuing such a strategy in the past five years.翻译:近几年来，近岸外包已成为一种趋势，但友岸外包是一种新现象，只有 11% 的受访者表示，他们在过去五年中已经采取了这种策略。

The European Union is still likely to be a loser in such corporate movements as the number or firms looking to move production out of the bloc remains larger than the number moving it in, and this could have a "significant" impact on employment.翻译:欧盟仍然可能成为此类企业迁移的输家，因为希望将生产转移出欧盟的企业数量仍然多于将其转移到欧盟的企业数量，这可能对就业产生“重大”影响。

The moves could also fuel inflation as close to half of firms said they expected the changes to result in higher prices, the paper added.翻译:该报补充说，这些举措还可能加剧通胀，因为近一半的公司表示，他们预计这些变化将导致价格上涨。

Reporting by Balazs Koranyi; Editing by Andrew Heavens翻译:巴拉兹·科兰尼 (Balazs Koranyi) 报道；安德鲁·天堂编辑

item.title: 迪诺拉苏州工厂产量增至三倍，以满足快速增长的亚洲市场
item.description:
Italy's Industrie De Nora (DNR.MI) said its plant in Souzhou, in China, would triple its production capacity, in line with the electrode maker's plans to increase manufacturing in the fast-growing Asian market.翻译:意大利迪诺拉工业公司(DNR.MI)表示，其位于中国苏州的工厂的产能将增加两倍，以符合该电极制造商在快速增长的亚洲市场增加产量的计划。

The project is part of De Nora's plan to expand in Asia, where the group is facing increasing demand, and be able to face request for technologies used to produce green hydrogen, the group said in a statement on Monday.翻译:该集团在周一的一份声明中表示，该项目是迪诺拉在亚洲扩张计划的一部分，该集团在亚洲面临不断增长的需求，并能够满足对用于生产绿色氢的技术的要求。

The Souzhou site, 70 km (43.5 miles) from Shanghai, was opened in 2005 and is De Nora's main site in China, serving Asian and Chinese clients as well as high-tech business partners.翻译:苏州工厂距离上海 70 公里（43.5 英里），于 2005 年开业，是迪诺拉在中国的主要工厂，为亚洲和中国客户以及高科技业务合作伙伴提供服务。

In particular, De Nora aims to strengthen its positioning in the maintenance services of chlor-alkali plants in China, which represent 45% of the global market, in the high-growth sector of electrodes for the production of the copper foil, used both in the manufacture of lithium batteries for electric cars and as a raw material for printed circuit boards.翻译:特别是，迪诺拉旨在加强其在中国氯碱工厂维护服务中的地位，该工厂占全球市场的 45%，在铜箔生产电极的高增长领域，铜箔用于生产铜箔。电动汽车锂电池的制造以及印刷电路板的原材料。
